hello this is chef john from food wishes
comm with a baked hot spinach artichoke
dip this is the video your neighborhood

of gently with a big pinch of salt after

give it a stir and just let the garlic's

alright I have one can of artichoke

then we're gonna throw those in a mixing

mixture to that some cream cheese a

to get it started but once you get it

but you know the old saying you gotta

nothing's gonna stick and even if it
